name: The Great Fleece (GarfGameDev)
description:
-- This may take up to a minute to load at first  --

Left click the ground to move.
Right click the ground to drop a one off coin where you click that will cause the guards to move towards it.

The goal is to grab the keycard from the sleeping guard and then reach the door at the top of the stairs at the end.

This is just a small demo showcasing camera and cutscene techiniques.
